title: Treze Dias Longe do Sol
overview: The collapse of a medical center in construction – over invoiced by the engineer in charge – creates two parallel realities: under the debris, the engineer himself, the daughter of the construction's main investor and a few workers struggle to survive. Meanwhile, above ground, there is a frenetic chase for those to blame. In this thriller packed with action, drama and suspense, as the story unfolds the rubble is dug, revealing the dark past of the characters.
